Package com.eventmaster.backend.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.controller.AdminController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
A class which handles the HTTP-requests for admin functions.
Author:
Fabian Eilber, Fabian Unger

    • getEventsOfOrganisation

      @PostMapping("/orga/{orgaId}/events") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Event>> getEventsOfOrganisation(@PathVariable Long orgaId)
      Endpoint for a part of the organisation to get all of its events
      Parameters:
      orgaId - Id of the corresponding orga
      Returns:
      List of events

    • changeOrganisationDetails

      @PostMapping("/orga/change") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> changeOrganisationDetails(@RequestBody Organisation organisation)
      Endpoint for the admin of an organisation to change her details.
      Parameters:
      organisation - New Organisation object with new data.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • removeUserFromOrganisation

      @PostMapping("/orga/{orgaId}/user/{userMail}/remove") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> removeUserFromOrganisation(@PathVariable long orgaId, @PathVariable String userMail)
      Endpoint for an admin to remove a user from an organisation.
      Parameters:
      orgaId - ID of the organisation from which the user will be removed.
      userMail - Mail of the user.
      Returns:
      String about success of failure.

    • setPersonAdmin

      @PostMapping("/orga/{orgaId}/user/role/admin") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> setPersonAdmin(@PathVariable long orgaId, @RequestBody String userMail)
      Endpoint to set the role of a user in an organisation to admin.
      Parameters:
      orgaId - ID of the organisation.
      userMail - Mail of the user who will be admin.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

      Parameters:
      orgaId - ID of the organisation.

    • createGroup

      @PostMapping("/orga/{orgaId}/group/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createGroup(@PathVariable long orgaId, @RequestBody Group group)
      Endpoint for an admin to save a group in the database.
      Parameters:
      group - Group object which will be saved in the database.
      Returns:
      String about success of failure.

    • changeGroup

      @PostMapping("/group/change") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> changeGroup(@RequestBody Group group)
      Endpoint for an admin to change a group in the database.
      Parameters:
      group - New group which will overwrite the existing Group.
      Returns:
      String about success of failure.

    • deleteGroup

      @PostMapping("/group/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteGroup(@RequestBody long groupId)
      Endpoint to delete a group.
      Parameters:
      groupId - ID of the group which will be deleted.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • addUserToGroup

      @PostMapping("/group/{groupId}/user/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addUserToGroup(@PathVariable long groupId, @RequestBody String userMail)
      Endpoint to add a user to a group.
      Parameters:
      groupId - ID of the group.
      userMail - Mail address of the user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • removeUserFromGroup

      @PostMapping("/group/{groupId}/user/remove") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeUserFromGroup(@PathVariable long groupId, @RequestBody String userMail)
      Endpoint to remove a user from a group.
      Parameters:
      groupId - ID of the group.
      userMail - Mail address of the user.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • changeOrganizerOfEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/{eventId}/organizer/change") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> changeOrganizerOfEvent(@PathVariable long eventId, @RequestBody String userMail)
      Endpoint to change the organizer of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userMail - Mail address of the new organizer.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
